DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to determine how protein supplementation, with or without exercise, affects functional capacity, strength, body composition, and physical activity in hemodialysis patients.
DOC.brief_title: The Effects of Resistance Exercise and Protein Supplementation in Hemodialysis Patients
DOC.criteria: On hemodialysis for more than 3 months, on a thrice weekly hemodialysis program; Adequately dialyzed (Kt/V ≥ 1.2). Age ≥ 18 years old. Patients unable to perform exercise due to cardiovascular disease, osteoarthritis, etc., as determined by the PI and the primary physician of the subject. Pregnant women. Patients hospitalized within the last month prior to the study.
